meanings.definition: individuals who participate in skateboarding culture
meanings.sent1: The skatepunks practiced their tricks at the skatepark.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of skatepunks skating down the street.
meanings.sent3: The skatepunks were so dedicated, they skated even in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for skateboarding turned her into a true skatepunk.
meanings.sent5: The skatepunks' enthusiasm for skateboarding was contagious.

meanings.definition: a group of rebellious youth who enjoy skateboarding and punk music
meanings.sent1: The skatepunks gathered at the skate shop to plan their next adventure.
meanings.sent2: The skatepunks' playlist was filled with energetic punk songs.
meanings.sent3: The skatepunks' rebellious spirit showed in their daring skateboarding stunts.
meanings.sent4: In the world of skatepunks, skateboarding and punk music were inseparable.
meanings.sent5: The skatepunks' love for skateboarding and punk music defined their identity.

meanings.definition: to act or dress like a member of the skatepunk subculture
meanings.sent1: She decided to skatepunk for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: He always skatepunks when he goes to the skatepark.
meanings.sent3: The way he skatepunks with his ripped jeans and beanie is so cool.
meanings.sent4: She skatepunks effortlessly, blending into the skateboarding crowd.
meanings.sent5: Skatepunking for the event made her feel like a true rebel.
